name: BaseballScoreCheck
0:
”Alexa, open Baseball Score Check”
”tigers yesterday”
”check the Indians last week”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baseball score check
des: Baseball Scorecheck is your major league scorecard on Alexa! Tell Alexa to 'Open Baseball Scorecheck' then ask for any team and date back to the 2005 season. For instance, ask 'Alexa, check the Mariners score June 2 2016'. For help, say 'HELP'. For a complete team list, say 'TEAM LIST'.
